welcome_message_body: Welcome to Escuintla, Guatemala! This charming city is known for its beautiful beaches, rich cultural heritage, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Escuintla has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Botanero La Bendición
restaurants.description: Botanero La Bendición is a mexican restaurant located in Escuintla.

restaurants.name: La Tia Chayo
restaurants.description: La Tia Chayo is a comfort food restaurant located in Escuintla.

restaurants.name: El Dragon de Beijing
restaurants.description: El Dragon de Beijing is a chinese restaurant located in Escuintla.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Puerto San Jose Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
